title: Natalim
author: Natalim
content: I was browsing other local boards, and I've noticed that some of them are very active. This made me realize that maybe it's time to make our local board more active as well. In my opinion, the best way to achieve that is by having a new merit source. Merits can genuinely entice posters to participate more actively in discussions.If we analyze the reasons why other locals are more active than us, the main factor seems to be the presence of "merits."I believe we had a merit source before, but they weren't as active in distributing merits compared to other merit sources (This is my personal observation). Additionally, when their reputation was ruined, they stopped being active in the forum. That was a long time ago, and we haven't had a merits source since, so I think it's about time to have one again. I know there are many active forum members here, so I'd like to suggest that if they don't want to voluntarily apply, we can encourage them by nominating them.So here's my idea: How about we nominate a forum member here whom we believe would be a good candidate to apply for becoming a merit source?I will start with by nominating @bisdak40

comments.author: bisdak40
comments.body: I'm so flattered by the nomination kabayan pero sa totoo lang ang daming mas magaling pa dyan kay sa akin.Meron namang pending na application si @crwth, sana maaprobahan na yon.Kahit wala tayong merit source pero active naman tayo sa lokal natin, palagay ko darating din yang mga merit na yan dahil may ibang lahi naman na bumibisita sa lokal natin na nagpapaulan minsan na merit.Bihira lang kasi yong tao na gusto na maging merit source kasi ang laki ng responsibilidad noon at kunting pagkakamali lang ay kakastiguhin ka kaagad kaya i-push nalang natin yong application ni @crwth.

comments.author: JackieKing
comments.body: Two people gave me two merits a few days ago, I am very happy to receive them. I want you guys to help us grow by supporting those who have small IDs like me. I am doing only Bounty campaign for my Jr member. Unable to do Signature Campaign.

comments.author: bhadz
comments.body: Kailangan talaga maging active ulit ang local natin, marami rami tayong dito pero karamihan ay hindi na natambay dito kasi posibleng may dahilan sila o di kaya dahil nga hindi masyadong active at konti lang ang topics. Antayin nalang din natin yung application ni crwth kung ma approve ba bilang merit source. comments.author: bhadz
comments.body: Quote from: Natalim on August 03, 2023, 11:00:59 AMLike I mentioned, more options are better, no disrespect to crwth as I believe he is also a good forum member. Agree ako sayo kabayan, no disrespect at parehas lang natin gusto maging active ulit itong local natin. Sayang lang na maraming nawala na local members at contributors sa atin na hindi natin inaasahan. Ganun lang talaga siguro. At salamat sa initiative mo kabayan at sana mas madami ding source ang maapprove dito sa atin.

comments.body: Quote from: JackieKing on August 04, 2023, 04:36:52 AMI am trying to stand by people. I want to help people. And I hope you all stand by those who have small accounts like me. We do and if people appreciates your post, you'll be merited but don't make it look like that you're begging for it. Get into meaningful discussions and not just get engaged into bounties. While this local is open to everybody from other locals as well, it will be easier for you to converse in your own local and have genuine discussions.
